title: Crazy Lol Glitch!!
body:
Ok so I was playing a ranked, when that (Trying to reconnect) thing came up and i checked my internet and it was fine. So i quit out and went to reconnect and when i got back onto the lol client it said: (skip waiting for results) and i was like wtf because we werent even close to finishing the game and no one surrendered. I checked my match history and that game hasnt shown up in it! and i am currently in a new game when im meant to be in the other game!
Need some feedback to no whats going on!! 
Thanks

Ign: ImJono

replies.body: Servers are probably eating plutonium atm. I'd wait a few days.
